text: The Hacks Season 4 Episode 7&8 release date and time are right around the corner, and many are eager to know the streaming details. In the previous episode, the focus group informed that the show isn’t performing well with women on it. However, Deborah doesn’t give up and tries her best to impress them. On the other hand, Kayla and Jimmy are on a hunt for the right guest. Now, in the upcoming episode, Deborah will receive the Courage in Comedy award. Elsewhere, trouble arises for the Late Night Show when it finds a guest at the very last minute. Moreover, Ava began feeling overwhelmed on the show. Check out all the release details you need to know about the upcoming episode. When is the Hacks Season 4 Episode 7&8 release date & time? The episode’s release date is May 15, and its release time is 9 PM ET / 6 PM PT. Check out its release times in the U.S. below: TimezoneRelease DateRelease TimeEastern TimeMay 15, 202509:00 PMPacific TimeMay 15, 202506:00 PM Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in Hacks Season 4. Where to watch Hacks Season 4 Episode 7&8 You can watch Hacks Season 4 Episode 7&8 via Max. Max is a popular streaming destination that provides viewers with an extensive list of original programming, such as Gossip Girl (2021) and Peacemaker. What is Hacks about? Hacks is a drama series that centers around an unexpected bond between Deborah Vance, a legendary comedian, and Ava, a controversial writer. Despite their clashing opinions and personalities, they, in an unlikely way, help each other in figuring out their problems. The official synopsis for Hacks is as follows: “Explore a dark mentorship that forms between Deborah Vance, a legendary Las Vegas comedian, and an entitled, outcast 25-year-old.”
html:
The Hacks Season 4 Episode 7&8 release date and time are right around the corner, and many are eager to know the streaming details.

In the previous episode, the focus group informed that the show isn’t performing well with women on it. However, Deborah doesn’t give up and tries her best to impress them. On the other hand, Kayla and Jimmy are on a hunt for the right guest. Now, in the upcoming episode, Deborah will receive the Courage in Comedy award. Elsewhere, trouble arises for the Late Night Show when it finds a guest at the very last minute. Moreover, Ava began feeling overwhelmed on the show.

Check out all the release details you need to know about the upcoming episode.

When is the Hacks Season 4 Episode 7&8 release date & time?

The episode’s release date is May 15, and its release time is 9 PM ET / 6 PM PT.

Check out its release times in the U.S. below:

Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in Hacks Season 4.

Where to watch Hacks Season 4 Episode 7&8

You can watch Hacks Season 4 Episode 7&8 via Max.

Max is a popular streaming destination that provides viewers with an extensive list of original programming, such as Gossip Girl (2021) and Peacemaker.

What is Hacks about?

Hacks is a drama series that centers around an unexpected bond between Deborah Vance, a legendary comedian, and Ava, a controversial writer. Despite their clashing opinions and personalities, they, in an unlikely way, help each other in figuring out their problems.

The official synopsis for Hacks is as follows:

“Explore a dark mentorship that forms between Deborah Vance, a legendary Las Vegas comedian, and an entitled, outcast 25-year-old.”
